definition: lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted

sentences.english: This mountainside was unfrequented all day.
sentences.chinese: 這是一條人跡罕至的山路。

sentences.english: Vast areas are arid or semi-desert, and virtually uninhabited.
sentences.chinese: 大片地區都是乾旱或者半沙漠，人跡罕至，渺無人煙。

sentences.english: The scientist has spent six months in the solitudes of the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 這位科學家已經在人跡罕至的南極待了六個月。

sentences.english: The scientist has spent six months in the solitudes of the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 這位科學家已經在人跡罕至的南極待了六個月了。

sentences.english: Vast areas are arid or semi-desert, and virtually uninhabited .
sentences.chinese: 大片土地乾旱荒蕪，屬半沙漠，人跡罕至，渺無人煙。

definition: no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
